long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In this game, colorful balloons appear randomly on the right side of the screen, moving either vertically or horizontally. Your mission is to pop as many balloons as possible before time runs out.

How to Play?

1) Control the shooter at the bottom left by moving your mouse left and right to adjust the firing angle.

2) Balloons will appear with random colors and move back and forth in their designated direction.

3) You have 30 seconds on the timer to pop as many balloons as you can.

4) Each successful shot collapses the balloon and earns you points, which are shown at the top left corner.

5) Whether you hit or miss, a new balloon will appear in a random spot with a new color and direction.

Strategy:

- Carefully time your shots based on the balloon's speed, direction, and position.
- Aim quickly and accurately to maximize your score before the timer runs out.

When the game ends, your final score will be displayed with an option to restart. Have fun with this challenging game as you sharpen your timing and aim! Additionally, once the game ends, some of our featured products will be presented for more fun options to explore!
